summary: Dark-themed Trading Journal Web Application built with React.js and Tailwind CSS. Features sidebar navigation, dashboard overview, trade logging form with psychology/mistakes tracking, trade history table, and analytics. No authentication — app opens directly to dashboard. UI uses deep navy/black background with orange accents, glassmorphism effects, and neon-bordered Buy/Sell buttons.
architectural_notes: Frontend: React.js + Tailwind CSS, dark theme (#0f172a background, #f59e0b orange accent), Inter/sans-serif font
No authentication — app opens directly to Trade Journal dashboard
Glassmorphism UI style with neon-border Buy/Sell buttons

existing_features.title: Apply glassmorphism styling across all card components, modals, and sidebar panels: use semi-transparent backgrounds (e.g., rgba white/black with 10–15% opacity), backdrop-blur, and subtle border highlights to create a premium frosted-glass look consistent with the existing deep navy dark theme.

Restyle the Buy and Sell direction buttons/badges throughout the app (New Trade form, Trade Log table, etc.) to use soft neon borders instead of solid fills — green neon border for Buy and red neon border for Sell — with a glowing box-shadow effect that activates on hover and click.

Increase the size of sidebar navigation icons and switch to a minimalistic icon set. Each navigation item (Dashboard, New Trade, Trade History/Trade Log, Analytics, Risk Management, Settings) must display a larger, clean icon alongside the label text.

Add an interactive P&L line chart at the top of the Dashboard page showing the net profit/loss for the last 7 calendar days. The chart should use trade data from the existing store, show day labels on the X-axis and P&L values on the Y-axis, and visually distinguish positive vs negative days (green vs red line/fill).

Add a Live Risk-Reward Calculator section in the New Trade form (NewTradePage). As the user types Entry Price and Stop Loss values, automatically calculate and display: Risk per Share (|Entry - Stop Loss|), Risk Amount (Risk per Share × Quantity), and Risk:Reward Ratio using the Target price. All calculations must update in real-time without any button press.

Add a Trade Conviction Meter to the New Trade form — a 1-to-5 star rating slider/selector that lets the trader record their confidence level ('conviction') before entering a trade. This conviction value must be saved as part of the trade record and displayed in the Trade Log table.

Add search and filter controls to the Trade Log page (TradeLogPage) allowing users to filter past trades by Strategy (setup/strategy tag) and by Mistake Type (e.g., FOMO, Early Entry, etc.). The filters should work alongside the existing filters and update the trade table in real-time.

new_feature_requests.summary: Glassmorphism effect on UI backgrounds for premium dark mode look
Color-coded Buy/Sell buttons with soft neon borders that glow on click (green for Buy, red for Sell)
Bigger minimalistic sidebar icons alongside navigation text
Interactive P&L line chart showing last 7 days profit/loss at top of screen
Live Risk-Reward Calculator that auto-calculates risk per share from Entry Price and Stop Loss
Trade Conviction Meter: 1-5 star slider to record trader's feeling before entering a trade
Journal Search/Filters to search past trades by Strategy or Mistake Type
